document_data.name: Rallio deVore
document_data.mainbody: '''Rallio deVore''' was a [[tiefling]] in the [[Monastery of the Precipice]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.History: Rallio entered into an infernal pact but regretting the decision he went to [[Spellgard]] in search of Lady [[Saharel]]'s counsel in [[1478 DR]]. Quickly, however, Rallio despaired of ever seeing the Lady and became depressed, starting to spend most of his time drinking.
